Html:
Excuse me, but this is probably something simple I overlooked.

My druid is a jewelcrafter and thus have the BoP gems available to him.

I added the Runed Dragon's Eye (32 Spellpower) to my items via the Item Editor and yet it does not appear in my right pane when I select gems.

I have checked the "Jewelcrafting" filter in case it filters gems as well.

Runed Scarlet Ruby (19 spellpower), currently shows as highest ranked gem choice for the tree model, I suppose the gem I tried to add would actually be number 1 choice.

So, how do I make it appear in the list of available gems?
Ok, think I spotted a bug. If you try to import these Prismatic gems via the "Add..." button in the item editor the "Slot" spot is staying at "None" and is not actually being set to prismatic.
